# IDistributionContract
[Git Source](https://github.com/Uniswap/twap-auction/blob/8cece7b4429d881c014ab2471e59a46f1e79e8cb/src/interfaces/external/IDistributionContract.sol)

Interface for token distribution contracts.


## Functions
### onTokensReceived

Notify a distribution contract that it has received the tokens to distribute


```solidity
function onTokensReceived() external;
```
